parameters.jsonBody:
=[{
  "sync_type": "orders",
  "orders_fetched": {{ $('Process & Validate Data').item.json.orderCount }},
  "line_items_fetched": {{ $('Process & Validate Data').item.json.lineItemCount }},
  "errors_count": {{ $('Process & Validate Data').item.json.errorCount }},
  "status": "{{ $('Process & Validate Data').item.json.errorCount > 0 ? 'partial' : 'success' }}",
  "error_message": "{{ $('Process & Validate Data').item.json.errors.join(', ') }}",
  "synced_at": "{{ $now.toISOString() }}"
}]
